name: Ok I Pull Up
description:
Pull up as a baby capybara in this 3D rage platformer!

You, a capybara, must use your jumping skills to escape the quarantined tree tower. Explore a seamless world, split into three unique levels. Reach the end of the tower and claim unimaginable rewards.

  • Challenging, skill-based gameplay
  • Climb the tower only by jumping
  • Miss a jump, fall, and lose all your progress
  • Start all over again
  • Cute theme with memorable side characters
  • Several fun platforms and challenging obstacles

This game will test your patience to the extreme. Good luck.

*This game is a student project created over a period of 9 weeks
